title: Agency Landing Page Web
description: A sleek agency landing page, marrying modern design with intuitive navigation. Engage visitors and amplify your brand with captivating visuals. Elevate your online presence effortlessly.

title: Gym Landing Page Web
description: A captivating gym landing page website designed to inspire fitness enthusiasts! With a focus on responsive design, dynamic navbar and layout that seamlessly adapts to various screen sizes and also beautiful animation while scrolling.

title: Recipe App
description: Explore popular recipes, find your favorites, and explore recipe information, including ingredients and step-by-step instructions, all powered by the Spoonacular API.

title: Movie App
description: Embark on a cinematic journey with my project-based portfolio, powered by the TMDB API. Explore popular movies, dive into detailed movie information, including trailers and cast members.
